Design System

Icon Style Guide

Lucero Legal brand icon system based on Lucide React with consistent styling and premium animations.

Brand Flavor Configuration
The Lucide-based icon system uses these consistent brand settings
Stroke Width
1.5px
Elegant, refined
Corner Radius
2px
Subtle refinement
End Caps
Round
Soft, approachable
Color
currentColor
Inherits from parent
Size Variants
Four standard sizes for different contexts
Small (16px)
Inline text, badges
Medium (24px)
UI default, navigation
Large (32px)
Feature cards, emphasis
Extra Large (48px)
Hero sections, major CTAs

Quality Gates
Checklist before any icon goes live
Matches Lucide stroke weight (1.5px)
Uses same corner radius (2px)
Has round end caps
Readable at 16px
Balanced at 24px
No visual clash with neighboring icons
Color inherits properly
Works in both light and dark modes
Screen reader accessible
Respects prefers-reduced-motion
